DOC.brief_summary: This study determine relative abuse potential intact chew PF-00345439 ( Oxycodone Extended-Release Capsules ) compare crush oxycodone HCL immediate release ( IR ) tablets placebo administer orally non-dependent , recreational opioid user .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year recreational opioid user NOT dependent opioids . Evidence history clinically significant medical condition . Diagnosis substance and/or alcohol dependence ( exclude caffeine nicotine ) . Has participate , currently participate , seek treatment substanceand/or alcoholrelated disorder ( exclude nicotine caffeine ) . Has positive urine drug screen ( UDS ) exclude tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) . Has positive alcohol breath test . Has history condition opioid contraindicate . History sleep apnea past 5 year resolve correct . Other severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation investigational product administration may interfere interpretation study result . Positive test Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV . Allergy history hypersensitivity naloxone HCl , oxycodone HCl , opioids , and/or lactose . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) .
